attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I appeal to the prime minister to stop the adverising of 'NEW DAZ' We have seen this on our TV's for the last 45 years and our whites are no whiter!

How white can white be?

How new can 'New DAZ' be?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
